mapper.select: SELECT t1.username AS username,t1.age AS age,t1.collage AS collage,t1.cla AS cla, t1.major AS major, t1.avatar_name AS avatarName,t2.count AS `count`,t3.attention AS attention, t4.fan AS fan FROM (SELECT username,age,collage,cla,major, avatar_name FROM t_user WHERE id=#{value}) t1, (SELECT COUNT(*)AS `count` FROM t_article WHERE uid=#{value}) t2, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS attention FROM t_atten_fan WHERE fid=#{value}) t3, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS fan FROM t_atten_fan WHERE tid=#{value}) t4

SELECT a.id AS id, a.`pub_time` AS pubTime, a.title AS title, a.`cover_url` AS coverUrl, a.`num` AS num, c.`cname` AS category FROM t_article a,t_article_category c WHERE a.`cid`=c.`id`AND a.`uid`=#{value} ORDER BY a.`pub_time` DESC
SELECT u.id AS id, u.avatar_name AS avatarName,u.username AS username FROM t_user u,(SELECT tid FROM t_atten_fan WHERE fid=#{value}) t WHERE u.id=t.tid
